plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🥗 I am a healthy part of your dinner.
🌱 I start as a tiny seed.

plant.question: I have a trunk and many leaves, and birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🌳 I am very tall!
🍁 My leaves change colors in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I am often given as a gift.
🌷 I grow in a garden.
🌸 I can be red, yellow, pink, or purple.

plant.question: I am long and yellow and grow in a bunch. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am a yellow fruit when I'm ripe!
🌴 I grow in warm places.
🙊 Monkeys peel me before they eat me.

plant.question: I have thorns and smell sweet. I'm often red or pink. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me to show they care.
🥀 I have pointy bits that can prick you!
🌿 I am a popular flower.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground. I am orange and good for your eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits love to eat me!
🚜 Farmers grow me in the ground.
👁️ Some people say I help you see better.

plant.question: I'm a big, round fruit that's green on the outside and red on the inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and refreshing on a hot day.
🌱 I grow in the summer.
⚫ You can spit my seeds.

plant.question: I'm a tall plant that makes a yellow food that you can pop. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in a field.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🐥 Chickens also love to eat me

plant.question: I am a very tall tree with needles instead of leaves. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 My needles smell nice and woodsy.
🎁 Presents go under me.
🐿️ Squirrels like to hide nuts in me.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a very tall plant. My seeds can be ground into flour. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 Birds like to eat my seeds.
🌾 I sway in the breeze.
🍞 People use my ground-up seeds to make bread.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and like to blow bubbles. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I have fins and a tail!
🌊 I live underwater.
🫧 I make bubbles when I breathe.

ocean.question: I am very big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 You can swim in me, but be careful!
🗺️ I cover most of the Earth.
🐳 Whales and dolphins live in me.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and live in the sea. I walk sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have pinchers.
🚶 I don't walk forwards.
🏠 My shell is my home.

ocean.question: I am a big sea animal with black and white colors. People love to watch me jump!

hints.text: 🐬 I am a type of mammal.
😀 I'm known for my intelligence and friendly behavior.
🌊 I live in pods.

ocean.question: I’m a colorful fish that lives in a sea anemone for protection. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I star in a movie about finding someone.
🧡 I am orange and white.
🏠 Anemones are my home.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🎨 I can change color to hide.
💨 Ink helps me escape.

ocean.question: I’m a slow sea animal that has a shell on its back and lays eggs in the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🏖️ I crawl slowly on beaches.
🥚 Baby versions of me hatch from eggs.

ocean.question: I’m a very big fish with many sharp teeth! People are sometimes scared of me.

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🌊 I am often gray and have a fin on my back.
🦷 My teeth are very sharp for eating fish.

ocean.question: I am found on the beach, but I used to be a home in the sea. You can hear the ocean if you hold me to your ear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 Sea creatures live in me.
🏖️ You can find me by the water.
👂 You can hear the ocean when you hold me up to your ear.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean, but I breathe air like you. I sing songs underwater.

hints.text: 🐳 I'm the largest animal on Earth.
🗣️ I use songs to communicate with others of my kind.
🌊 I have a blowhole on top of my head.
